name: XOXO Day
description: Xoxoday is a Giift company & together they offer end-to-end SaaS solutions for managing engagement, loyalty, incentives and rewards. Our combined technology offering helps businesses drive growth with their customers, employees, sales teams, channel partners and merchants. Our suite of SaaS solutions includes LoyaltyCore, Marketplace, GiiftBox, Xoxoday, Empuls, and Compass. Giift addresses all market segments and industries. From the largest global corporations to mid-sized domestic entities and local merchants, our combined platform helps attract and retain customers and incentivize employees and partners.
Headline: Rewards, Incentives, Payouts, Loyalty & Commissions Infrastructure for Businesses
ShortDescription: A platform for automating rewards, incentives, and payout programs at scale.
